item.title: Big Pothole in the middle of the road. Extremely dangerous, damaged my car and alloy from this pothole. Unavoidable to go around it, needs to be dealt with ASAP., 8th June
item.description:
I am writing to formally lodge a complaint regarding damage incurred to my car alloy wheel due to a pothole located on Lower Clapton Road. On the morning of 08/06/2025, while driving, I hit a particularly deep pothole that caused significant damage to my alloy wheel. I have attached photographs to this letter as evidence of the damage, as well as images showing the pothole in question. The damage to my vehicle has resulted in both aesthetic and functional issues, and I am now faced with the need to repair or replace the damaged alloy. I would like something done about this ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11,13,13a, Atherden Road, Clapton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins left uncollected for 6 weeks!, 8th June
item.description:
Bins left uncollected for 6 weeks - called council day of missed collection again and still not collected. No feedback as to why they keep getting missed. Other people have now started leaving rubbish on top - bags are ripped open by animals. Had to report last week due to fly tipping and the bins were still not collected. Please get this sorted as it is horrible for the area!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Shooters Hill Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet
